main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted moving parallel with a military aircraft over the Pacific for a duration of 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object signaled the aircraft after moving parallel for some time., The object was described as light and bright., The object suddenly moved away to the northeast at high speed., It was confirmed that there was no physical evidence of the sighting., The report highlights the involvement of multiple military personnel and airbases in the follow-up.
witness description: Military personnel, specifically a Captain from Tachikawa Air Force Base
